alert.note: Alert for Mellette; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 03 at 2:03PM MDT until April 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TUESDAY TO 7 PM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. A wintry mix of freezing rain, sleet, and snow is possible tonight into Tuesday morning. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph Tuesday afternoon into Wednesday. * WHERE...Mellette County, Todd County and Tripp County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Rosebud Reservation. * WHEN...From 1 AM Tuesday to 7 PM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means the combination of snow, blowing snow, and strong winds will create dangerous whiteout conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
